page.title: 11BESTWOOD EDUCATION
page.content: In this square, there is one school, Bestwood Park,the Hawthorne Primary School and nursery.There are 83 children on roll, plus 40 children in the nursery.The school numbers will start to rise when the building development behind the school begins to have occupiers.We expect the school to have 115 children,plus nursery children in July 1986. The school had 260 children on roll in 1960.We think the numbers have gone down because the size of families is much smaller, and there are many older people in the village.
